ideas.title: Automated Trading Bot
ideas.description: Build a bot that can execute trades based on the research findings - S/R levels, MA crossovers, with proper risk management

ideas.title: Voice Interface for Cosmo
ideas.description: Add voice input/output so Bowz can talk to the team hands-free

ideas.title: Mobile Dashboard App
ideas.description: React Native or PWA version of the dashboard for mobile access

ideas.title: Auto-Commit & Push for Code Changes
ideas.description: When I make changes to files, automatically commit to git with descriptive messages and push to GitHub. Saves manual steps and keeps history clean.

ideas.title: Smart Notification System
ideas.description: Priority-based alerts - only ping Bowz for urgent stuff. Digest mode for non-urgent updates. Timezone-aware (EST).

ideas.title: Crypto Portfolio Tracker Integration
ideas.description: Pull data from CoinGecko/CMC for Bowz's holdings. Track P&L, set price alerts, correlate with the trading research.

ideas.title: Self-Healing System Monitor
ideas.description: If a service goes down (like the dashboard server), auto-restart it and notify. Keep everything running 24/7.

ideas.title: Discord Command System
ideas.description: Let Bowz send commands via Discord DMs - deploy agents, check status, run tasks. Like a CLI but in Discord.
